high_descs: Walk forward, into the door on the right into the bedroom, and over to the side of the bed.
Pick up the pencil that is on the bed behind the blanket.
Walk over to the side of the desk near the desklamp.
Turn on the desklamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the pencil with the DeskLamp light.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the bed.
Take the pencil from the bed.
Turn around and go near the desklamp.
Put the pencil near the desklamp, it will be glow.
anns.task_desc: To glow the DeskLamp using the pencil.

high_descs: Turn around and go near the bed
Take the pencil from the bed
Turn around and go near the desk lamp
Put the pencil on the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Placed the pencil on the desk lamp
